Set the Border and Mask texture coordinates.

Remarks:
This function copies all the content from the address to the class.

void Sonetto::Window::setTileMode ( bool  mode  ) 

Set the background tile mode.

Parameters:
mode The way this window will texturize the background False: Stretch the texture to the border of the object True: This will map the baground based on the screen (note: the result depends upon the Screen Metrics Mode for this object)
